name: Garlic Sauteed Shiitake Mushrooms
keywords: garlic, shiitake, gluten-free, nut-free, vegetarian, side dish
recipeIngredient: 6 ounces large shiitake mushrooms, stems removed
Salt and freshly ground black pepper

recipeInstructions.text: Combine butter and garlic in saute pan. Heat until butter is melted and garlic starts to sizzle, about 30 seconds. Do not let garlic brown.
Add mushrooms and saute 3 to 4 minutes, turning until lightly browned. Season to taste with salt and pepper, sprinkle with parsley and serve.
